Text.Page:
I'm sending you this message from Mount Tyrannas, which is as harsh and dismal as a Frost Dragon's breath.
After the Exodor Core was destroyed, I thought the worst of it was behind us but strange things have been happening in Arborea lately.
Evil that was believed to have been sealed off seems to be appearing once again. Please get to the bottom of these rumors.
I'll wait for you in the Citadel of Torment.

Vella

The rift between the dimensions has grown unstable after the Exodor Core was destroyed.
This crack is allowing ancient evils that had been sealed away to run amok once again. Please put a stop to them.

As it said in the message, ancient evil is running rampant here again.
Thulsa is said to have created these monsters using necromancy in the Citadel of Torment.
These creatures were supposed to have been dealt with or disappeared, but they've started appearing again."How could this happen?"

The Mysterium is working on the assumption that the destruction of the Exodor Core had a significant impact, enough to destabilize the rift between the dimensions.
Gardan is madness incarnate.
That such evil has reappeared can only be a bad omen.
Please restore peace to Acarum.

This is the entrance to the Killing Grounds where Gardan is holed up.
Garan, who takes particular delight in a good bloodbath, condemns innocent souls here.
These poor souls are said to still roam this place.
If you're ready to face Gardan, use this teleportal.

It truly is fantastic that you've defeated Gardan.
We can all breathe easy again for now.

However, we don't know what other consequences this unstable rift between the dimensions might bring.
Arborea might be doomed to fall."Not while I've got anything to do with it."

Hehe. That's true.
We can rely on you.
I really am grateful you're on our side.
